forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
